changelog: Multi-period on-call system: Support unlimited on-call periods
Period numbering: Each period gets a unique ID (#1, #2, #3...)
Month-end handling: Periods crossing months split at boundaries (23:59/00:01)
Only one period active at a time with visual badge on button
Export improvements: Multiple periods shown in CSV and Excel
Automatic schema migration from v1.2.0 (no data loss)
Correct monthly calculations: hours adjusted per month
All completed periods preserved for historical export
